name: Cat Herder 2020
description:
The ultimate 20-second herding cats simulator.

Instructions: Click & drag cats onto the rug.  Get them all on the rug at the same time before the timer runs out.

This game was made in one weekend for the Teeny Tiny DragonRuby MiniGameJam https://itch.io/jam/teenytiny-dragonruby-minigamejam-2020
